name: iCoolhunt
tag_list: photo-sharing, social-game, mobile, trendspotting, crowdsourcing, photo-bookmarking
overview:
iCoolhunt is a cross-platform geo-social game that lets its users collaboratively identify and track emerging trends on a global scale.

iCoolhunt iPhone app was launched in beta in the Spring of 2010 by brothers Luca and Alessio Morena. iCoolhunt has been featured in numerous Italian and international media outlets and has been promoted by Apple as a featured app in European App Stores in the summer of 2010.

iCoolhunt, in addition to its free web and mobile apps, will offer a B2B trend reporting and analytics service on the emerging and diffusion of new trends. In building its analytics products, iCoolhunt applies a cutting-edge research approach that combines data science and social science.

In July 2012, Atlante Ventures Mezzogiorno has invested in iCoolhunt.
